issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw:
Hi Adam,

Laser scans will be added to the launch configuration very soon. In the meantime, just add this node into your _**…/subt\_ros/launch/vehicle\_topics.launch**_ file.

> <node pkg="ros1\_ign\_bridge" type="parameter\_bridge" name="ros1\_ign\_bridge\_gpu\_lidar" args="/model/$\(arg name\)/front\_scan@sensor\_msgs/LaserScan@ignition.msgs.LaserScan">  
> <remap from="/model/$\(arg name\)/front\_scan" to="front\_scan"/>  
> </node>
content.html:
Hi Adam,

Laser scans will be added to the launch configuration very soon. In the meantime, just add this node into your …/subt_ros/launch/vehicle_topics.launch file.

<node pkg="ros1_ign_bridge" type="parameter_bridge" name="ros1_ign_bridge_gpu_lidar" args="/model/$(arg name)/front_scan@sensor_msgs/LaserScan@ignition.msgs.LaserScan">
<remap from="/model/$(arg name)/front_scan" to="front_scan"/>
</node>
